channel.title: New Development
channel.description:
[b]NEW UPDATE[/b] Made Object owners i.e. as the cannon was in RSC as people sayed shoots an entity within a view of 10... only the owner of the cannon can pick up / fire the cannon Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoFVdQ37NGo
Still waiting for suggestions on what to code....
[b]Old[/b]
Ok im tired of making new topics and what not...
flame if needed..
Im going to code new shit things people want...
and upon me feeling that it is stable enough i will release my server upon that feeling...
Supply what idea you think should be coded i will post a vid within 1-2 days
and i will post the code open source to the public unless asked otherwise.(if i feel the idea is worth coding) ^(This meaning dont ask for hay codes new npcs and dumb shit like that)
some vids...
[b]Quests:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7KeFm8Acc9c
^basic quest system
[b]Agility[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zg5mNlJW11Y
^basic agility system can easily be coded for "entire agility courses"
[b]Cannon/Range Attacking[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ira7dYkiZYY ^^Was bored thought would be fun... Cannon randomly finds a player and shoots them....^^ The ranging attack the mob looks for a player within a certain distance
-Gawdz

item.title: New Development
item.dc:creator: @propker propker
item.description:
@propker wrote:

lmaoooo tbh i want the romeo quest lmao [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 05:50:18 pm[/size][hr][quote=“KO9, post:16, topic:249622”][quote author=mapu link=topic=329011.msg2573038#msg2573038 date=1228787202]

I think the dwarf cannon is a big +1

It is something I have been playing around with on real RSC the last couple of days.

If you can develope that it would be cool. The ability for it to break also…

mapu pm me ur msn i got questions about how it works…

Yeh not a problem.

Ps: Have you read the dwarf cannon book? It has some basic info.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 08:35:09 pm[/size][hr]As a development thing though I have always had a thing for an automated minigame capture the flag, involving no admin or mod help.

Your stats are temporarily changed to flat 1’s with 5 range and your inventory is wiped and automatically given food and bronze arrows. Everybody transfered to a giant map underground.

When player picks up flag he glows and all others only equiped with arrows and food must range him down and try to get the flag themselfs and retrieve it to the end zone. Automated prize depending on how many players is given. Everybody then teleported back to a certain spot.

But I don’t think the interest for novelty things like this are earning, but more base skills and solid development am I right? It would be very fun though.
[/quote]

I want(ed) to make a CTF system. Can’t get anyone to make the map I want though, meh.[/quote]
I have an automated event system coming in play around Wednesday. you do ::event and a list of event pops up on the whole server for people to vote on. and the event with most votes the people whom voted are tellyed to it and the server host the event. kind like a “rock the vote” on other games… Just one of many advancements my secret coder is working on… ( no its not lefty lmao)

Read full topic

item.title: New Development
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:24, topic:249622”][quote author=Peter link=topic=329011.msg2573714#msg2573714 date=1228845503]

Read his post, wow.

“and upon me feeling that it is stable enough i will release my server upon that feeling…”

And all good suggestions that he tries to code he will keep open source. At which time I’ll see you back here with another well contemplated thought.

Did he release his code? Did he actually help anyone? This is a show-off, nothing else. And he’s putting all his efforts into things done before, things that don’t need to be “redone”. Try to think outside the box for a change.
[/quote]

Peter i feel like you should be muted you never show devlopment whats the point of having an account on this forum…

Im just showing some progress and i am willing to help other people if they have code problems / requests and

i lol’d irl Xent[/quote]

I’ll help out anyone that actually asks a proper question. And I’ll point out when I see something wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: New Development
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:18, topic:249622”][quote author=Peter link=topic=329011.msg2573548#msg2573548 date=1228830951]
I’m sorry, but what exactly is NEW there?
[/quote]

New as in, not RS2 posts, how-to questions, environment variables, advertising localhost server, etc.

Why does it matter that he used the word New instead of just Development? He’s trying to show progress, and all you do nowadays is troll around making useless, critical comments every time someone makes a post that is actually useful in this board.[/quote]

The fuck is posting 3 videos useful?

Ps: Have you read the dwarf cannon book? It has some basic info.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2008, 08:35:09 pm[/size][hr]As a development thing though I have always had a thing for an automated minigame capture the flag, involving no admin or mod help.

Your stats are temporarily changed to flat 1’s with 5 range and your inventory is wiped and automatically given food and bronze arrows. Everybody transfered to a giant map underground.

When player picks up flag he glows and all others only equiped with arrows and food must range him down and try to get the flag themselfs and retrieve it to the end zone. Automated prize depending on how many players is given. Everybody then teleported back to a certain spot.

But I don’t think the interest for novelty things like this are earning, but more base skills and solid development am I right? It would be very fun though.[/quote]

I want(ed) to make a CTF system. Can’t get anyone to make the map I want though, meh.

item.title: New Development
item.dc:creator: @Sidewinder Sidewinder
item.description:
@Sidewinder wrote:

What’s so special about this? This takes under 5 minutes to do. And next time, don’t use setlocation for the npc, only has a radius of 4 sq’s if you want to go over that they just appear on top of you. Cannon is nothing special at all, invactionhandler to handle the base, invuseonobject to handle the rest…Might be a distance formula in there, but I doubt you’re even capable of that.

Read full topic

item.title: New Development
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:5, topic:249622”][quote author=gawdz666 link=topic=329011.msg2572971#msg2572971 date=1228784635]

	public static boolean looseArrow(int damage) {
                                 if(getInventory().countId(runearrowid) > 0)
                            {
		return DataConversions.random(0, 15) == 0;
                  } else
		return DataConversions.random(0, 6) == 0;
	}

this is in rscd…
randomly between 1-15 tries you loose an rune arrow and 1-6 tries u lose any other arrow…

[/quote]

O lol, thats what he means. Geez[/quote]

how so? lol i answered his question

Read full topic
